question: The newly introduced Humsafar, Uday and Antyodaya are related to which ministry?
option1: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
explanation: Humsafar is an exclusively three-tiered AC train with optional meals for India’s middle-class travellers. Tejas is a fast moving train, similar to the Bullet train, achieving speeds ranging up to 130 km per hour. Antyodaya will be superfast trains, which will have only unreserved coaches. Uday will be double-decker trains, which have been introduced with the intention of increasing passenger capacity in railway services on busy routes.
